MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH46 postcode area of Leasowe and Moreton affecting Raleigh Road and surrounding streets. Our engineers are on site carrying out network investigations, following recent power cuts in the area and this may lead to short interruptions of supply. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:32 am on 7th April, 2021.
